articles.title: Tropical Depression Fred Moving Away From Hispaniola on a Potential Path Toward Florida | The Weather Channel - Articles from The Weather Channel | weather.com - The Weather Channel
articles.description: Tropical Depression Fred is tracking through the Caribbean. Here's what we know about its uncertain future right now. - Articles from The Weather Channel | weather.com
articles.content:
At a Glance
  • Tropical Depression Fred is moving away from Hispaniola toward Cuba.
  • Flooding rainfall and gusty winds could impact Hispaniola, the Bahamas and Cuba through late week.
